_header: Now is my robe I-shape forsooth all amiss
_description: On the Defilement of Sin — four monorhyming lines

OxfMert248.Transcription:
Now is my Robe y ssape for soþe al a mysMis turned is my Robe as
                    þe world isVoul to by holde & wlatful it isLich ich am an Ape
                    & no man I wys
